lines.text: This is real donkey time.

[seeing that Shung has been badly hurt by Scarface]
Shung, I've got medicine in my pack. I can treat your wounds.
I'll have none of your pathetic tricks, human!
You're the pathetic one, Shung. Your bigget enemy is your own ignorance.
Dad, you've got him trapped in there!
He's blind, probably only temporary, he took a good one to the head from Scarface.
Hey, let's seal him up so he'll never come out!
Never come out!
No... we can't.

[shocked]
What?
I know how you feel. I have no love for Shung, either. But if we do that we're no better than he is.
I can't believe this! My own dad whimping out?
Yeah, whimp out!

You're wrong, Kev. I know Shung acts like an animal, it'd be easy for us to do the same, we'd be just like him. But without our humanity, what's left? We'd really be back in the stone age. As much as I hate him, leave him a way out. It may take him a while to make the hole wide enough but at least its some air.
You're right, Dad.

[having used the crystals to replace batteries]
The power is back on! Look! Lights! Music!
That's great Dad.
[chases Annie and Tasha outside in a game of tag]
That's it? After all I went through today?
[leans his hand against his chin and looks sad]

[Kevin walks in and invites him into their game]
Dad... You're it!
You're history, Kevin!

[covering his eyes from behind]
Guess who?
Um... Madonna... Make that Madonna with a cold... Um... Michelle Phieffer?
You wish!
[giggles]
I sure do!
Surprise!
Oh, it's you, sweet face!
[kisses her cheek]
